name: Why do they call you Bouncy Bill?
name_original: Why do they call you Bouncy Bill?
description:
You fell into a slumber, and awoke falling through the sky. Perhaps, just perhaps, you can bounce your way to the island in the distance. 

Mouse to look, AWSD to move R to reset at any time.

Prequel to last week's project: https://dutchlish.itch.io/the-isle-of-bouncy-bill

All assets made in blender apart from the sounds:

Sounds from freesound.org: 

Music by ShadyDave 
Small Adventures Music Loop

Sounds: 
Falling, Comedic, A.wav InspectorJ (sped up)
